query.name: original_price
query.description: Item price

query.name: description
query.description: if description_type is normal , Description information should be set by this field.

query.name: weight
query.description: The weight of this item, the unit is KG.

query.name: item_name
query.description: Item name

query.name: item_status
query.description: Item status, could be UNLIST or NORMAL

query.name: dimension
query.description: The dimension of this item.

query.name: package_height
query.description: The height of package for this item, the unit is CM.

query.name: package_length
query.description: The length of package for this item, the unit is CM.

query.name: package_width
query.description: The width of package for this item, the unit is CM.

query.name: logistic_info
query.description: Logistic channel setting

query.name: size_id
query.description: Size ID, If specify logistic fee_type is SIZE_SELECTION size_id is required.

query.name: shipping_fee
query.description: Shipping fee, Only needed when logistics fee_type = CUSTOM_PRICE.

query.name: enabled
query.description: Whether channel is enabled for this item

query.name: logistic_id
query.description: ID of the channel

query.name: is_free
query.description: Whether cover shipping fee for buyer

query.name: attribute_list
query.description: This field is optional(expect Indonesia) depending on the specific attribute under different categories. Should call shopee.item.GetAttributes to get attribute first. Must contain all all mandatory attribute.

query.name: attribute_id
query.description: ID of attribute

query.name: value_id
query.description: Value ID. In the following cases, the value id needs to be uploaded as 0, and original_value_name is mandatory, needs to be filled in customized value. (1) AttributeInputType is TEXT_FILED; (2) AttributeInputType is COMBO_BOX or MULTIPLE_SELECT_COMBO_BOX, and the seller want to fill in a customized value.

query.name: original_value_name
query.description: Value name. original_value_name from product.get_attributes api. If value id=0, this field is required. If AttributeType is DATE_TYPE or TIMESTAMP_TYPE, you can upload timestamp(string type) as the original_value_name.

query.name: value_unit
query.description: Unit of attribute value (quantitative attribute only).

query.name: category_id
query.description: ID of category

query.name: image
query.description: Item images

query.name: image_id_list
query.description: ID of image

query.name: image_ratio
query.description: Ratio of image, OptionalAllowed ratios : "1:1" (default) "3:4" only applicable to whitelisted seller.

query.name: pre_order
query.description: Pre order setting

query.name: is_pre_order
query.description: Whether item is pre order

query.name: days_to_ship
query.description: The guaranteed days to ship orders. Please get the days_to_ship range from get_dts_limit api

query.name: item_sku
query.description: SKU tag of item

query.name: condition
query.description: Condition of item, could be USED or NEW

query.name: wholesale
query.description: Wholesale setting

query.name: min_count
query.description: Minimum count of this tier

query.name: max_count
query.description: Maximum count of this tier

query.name: unit_price
query.description: Unit price of this tier

query.name: video_upload_id
query.description: Video upload ID returned from video uploading API. Only accept one video_upload_id.

query.name: brand_id
query.description: Id of brand.

query.name: original_brand_name
query.description: Original name of brand( No Brand if not brand).

query.name: item_dangerous
query.description: This field is only applicable for local sellers in Indonesia and Malaysia. Use this field to identify whether a product is a dangerous product. 0 for non-dangerous product and 1 for dangerous product. For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.

query.name: tax_info
query.description: Tax information

query.name: ncm
query.description: Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves. (BR region) NCM must have 8 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a NCM enter the value "00"

query.name: same_state_cfop
query.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in the same state. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

query.name: diff_state_cfop
query.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

query.name: csosn
query.description: Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations.(BR region)

query.name: origin
query.description: Product source, domestic or foreig (BR region). |0 - National, except for those indicated in codes 3, 4, 5, and 8| |1 - Foreign: Direct import, except for that indicated in code 6| |2 - Foreign: Acquired in the domestic market, except for that indicated in code 7| |3 - National: Goods or products with Import Content greater than 40% and less than or equal to 70%| |4 - National: Produced in compliance with the basic production processes outlined in the legislations cited in the Agreements| |5 - National: Goods or products with Import Content less than or equal to 40%| |6 - Foreign: Direct import, without a national equivalent, listed by CAMEX and natural gas| |7 - Foreign: Acquired in the domestic market, without a national equivalent, listed by CAMEX and natural gas| |8 - National: Goods or products with Import Content greater than 70%|

query.name: cest
query.description: Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region) CEST must have 7 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a CEST enter the value "00".

query.name: measure_unit
query.description: (BR region)

query.name: hs_code
query.description: HS Code (Only for IN region)

query.name: tax_code
query.description: Tax Code (Only for IN region)

query.name: tax_type
query.description: tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 0: no tax type 1: tax-able 2: tax-free

query.name: pis
query.description: Only for BR shop. PIS - Programa de Integração Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights. PIS % - the tax applied to this product

query.name: cofins
query.description: Only for BR shop. COFINS – Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security. COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

query.name: icms_cst
query.description: Only for BR shop. ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

query.name: pis_cofins_cst
query.description: Only for BR shop. The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

query.name: federal_state_taxes
query.description: Only for BR shop. Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

query.name: operation_type
query.description: Only for BR shop. 1: Retailer 2: Manufacturer

query.name: ex_tipi
query.description: Only for BR shop. The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

query.name: fci_num
query.description: Only for BR shop. The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

query.name: recopi_num
query.description: Only for BR shop. RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as "papel imune" in Portuguese).

query.name: additional_info
query.description: Only for BR shop. Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

query.name: group_item_info
query.description: Only for BR shop. Required if the item is a group item.

query.name: group_qtd
query.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

query.name: group_unit
query.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

query.name: group_unit_value
query.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

query.name: original_group_price
query.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

query.name: group_gtin_sscc
query.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

query.name: group_grai_gtin_sscc
query.description: Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

query.name: export_cfop
query.description: [BR region] 7101 - for sales of self-produced goods 7102 - resale of third-party goods

query.name: complaint_policy
query.description: Complaint Policy for item. Only required for local PL sellers, ignored otherwise.

query.name: warranty_time
query.description: Value should be in one of ONE_YEAR TWO_YEARS OVER_TWO_YEARS.

query.name: exclude_entrepreneur_warranty
query.description: Whether to exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneurs.If True means "I exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneur"

query.name: complaint_address_id
query.description: Address for complaint. Fetch available addresses using v2.logistics.get_address_list, and use address_id returned from it.

query.name: additional_information
query.description: Additional information for warranty claim. Should be less than 1000 characters.

query.name: description_info
query.description: New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal

query.name: extended_description
query.description: If description_type is extended , Description information should be set by this field.

query.name: field_list
query.description: Field of extended description.

query.name: field_type
query.description: Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

query.name: text
query.description: If field_type is text text information will be set by this field.

query.name: image_info
query.description: If field_type is imageimage url will be set by this field.

query.name: image_id
query.description: Image id.

query.name: description_type
query.description: Values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended). If you want to use extended_description, this field must be inputed

query.name: seller_stock
query.description: seller stock（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

query.name: location_id
query.description: location id

query.name: stock
query.description: stock

query.name: gtin_code
query.description: - GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1. - They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN. - GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook. - That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing. Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as "00". The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API - Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number. - Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN. - Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

query.name: ds_cat_rcmd_id
query.description: category recommendation service id

query.name: promotion_images
query.description: Promotion Image Currently only allow one promoton image You could set promotion image only if the product images' ratio is 3:4

query.name: image_id_list
query.description: Promotion Image

query.name: brand_id
query.description: ID of the brand.

query.name: model_id
query.description: ID of the model.

query.name: year_id
query.description: ID of the year.

query.name: version_id
query.description: ID of the version.

query.name: scheduled_publish_time
query.description: Scheduled publish time of this item: 1) Can only set scheduled_publish_time for item with UNLIST status 2) Can only set the time from current time +1hour to current time +90days, and the time is only allowed to be accurate to the minute

query.name: authorised_brand_id
query.description: ID of authorised reseller brand.

query.name: size_chart
query.description: ID of size chart image. If you want to remove the image size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart" empty. You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept. Notes: Both CB shops and local shops are supported to set "size_chart".

query.name: size_chart_id
query.description: ID of template size chart. If you want to remove the template size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart_id" as 0. You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept. Notes: Only local shops are supported to set "size_chart_id", for CB shops please use "size_chart".

query.name: certification_info
query.description: For PH product certification input Required for some category and attribute option

query.name: certification_type
query.description: always = 3 for product certification

query.name: certification_no
query.description: Certification No.

query.name: permit_id
query.description: Permit ID, get from v2.product.get_product_certification_rule

query.name: expiry_date
query.description: expiry timestamp

query.name: ratio
query.description: image weight/ image height Will be optional in the future; can input 0.75 by default

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.uat.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/add_item?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "attribute_list": [
        {
            "attribute_id": 4990,
            "attribute_value_list": [
                {
                    "original_value_name": "Brand",
                    "value_id": 32142,
                    "value_unit": " kg"
                }
            ]
        }
    ],
    "brand": {
        "brand_id": 0,
        "original_brand_name": "nike"
    },
    "category_id": 14695,
    "complaint_policy": {
        "additional_information": "-",
        "complaint_address_id": 0,
        "exclude_entrepreneur_warranty": true,
        "warranty_time": "-"
    },
    "condition": "NEW",
    "description": "item description test",
    "description_info": {
        "extended_description": {
            "field_list": [
                {
                    "field_type": "-",
                    "image_info": {
                        "image_id": "-"
                    },
                    "text": "-"
                }
            ]
        }
    },
    "description_type": "-",
    "dimension": {
        "package_height": 11,
        "package_length": 11,
        "package_width": 11
    },
    "image": {
        "image_id_list": [
            "-"
        ]
    },
    "item_dangerous": 0,
    "item_name": "Item Name Example",
    "item_sku": "-",
    "item_status": "UNLIST",
    "logistic_info": [
        {
            "enabled": true,
            "is_free": true,
            "logistic_id": 80101,
            "shipping_fee": 23.12,
            "size_id": 0
        }
    ],
    "normal_stock": 33,
    "original_price": 123.3,
    "pre_order": {
        "days_to_ship": 3,
        "is_pre_order": true
    },
    "seller_stock": [
        {
            "location_id": "-",
            "stock": 0
        }
    ],
    "tax_info": {
        "cest": "-",
        "csosn": "-",
        "diff_state_cfop": "-",
        "hs_code": "-",
        "invoice_option": "-",
        "measure_unit": "-",
        "ncm": "-",
        "origin": "-",
        "same_state_cfop": "-",
        "tax_code": "-",
        "vat_rate": "-"
    },
    "video_upload_id": [
        "sg_f4bde9bc-ff3c-485e-a6dd-3161dab4b942_000000"
    ],
    "weight": 1.1,
    "wholesale": [
        {
            "max_count": 100,
            "min_count": 1,
            "unit_price": 28.3
        }
    ]
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: warning
schema.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

schema.name: weight
schema.description: The weight of this item, the unit is KG.

schema.name: days_to_ship
schema.description: The guaranteed days to ship orders.

schema.name: is_pre_order
schema.description: Whether this item is pre order

schema.name: enabled
schema.description: Whether this channel is enabled for this item

schema.name: is_free
schema.description: Whether cover shipping fee for buyer

schema.name: package_width
schema.description: The width of package for this item, the unit is CM.

schema.name: package_length
schema.description: The length of package for this item, the unit is CM.

schema.name: package_height
schema.description: The height of package for this item, the unit is CM.

schema.name: condition
schema.description: Item condition, could be NEW or USED

schema.name: item_dangerous
schema.description: This field is only applicable for local sellers in Indonesia and Malaysia. Use this field to identify whether a product is a dangerous product. 0 for non-dangerous product and 1 for dangerous product. For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.

schema.name: description_info
schema.description: New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If item with extended_description this field will return, otherwise do not return.

schema.name: extended_description
schema.description: If description_type is extended , description information should be set by this field.

schema.name: field_type
schema.description: Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

schema.name: text
schema.description: If field_type is text, text information will be set by this field.

schema.name: image_info
schema.description: If field_type is image, image url will be set by this field.

schema.name: description_type
schema.description: Values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended).

schema.name: complaint_policy
schema.description: Complaint Policy for item. Only returned for local PL sellers.

schema.name: warranty_time
schema.description: Time for a warranty claim. Could be ONE_YEAR, TWO_YEARS, OVER_TWO_YEARS.

schema.name: exclude_entrepreneur_warranty
schema.description: If True means "I exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneur"

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

error_codes.message: There is no access_token in query.
There is no partner_id in query.
There is no sign in query.
cnsc shop not upgraded, can not edit item.
Parameter is not match the constraints, {{.error_info}}.
Brand ID or brand name required
all BR tax field should be empty or be filled at same time
Get shop failed. please try later.
Our system is taking some time to respond, please try later.
System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.
A similar product has already been uploaded
Invalid price, please use the correct format
Attribute format is invalid. NCC field only allows Eng Alphanumeric input
NCC filed only allows character length less than 50.
Please upload your products to UNLIST status. Products will be published automatically by Shopee at the official launch date.
Shipping channel cannot be enabled as product price exceeds limit.
System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.
System error, please try again later or contact the OpenAPI support team.
The current item belong to the full FBS or B2C shop, so normal stock must be equal to 0
This is not a valid GTIN. Please, inform a valid number.
This is not a valid GTIN. Please, inform a valid number.
Can not use OpenAPI to edit/create VSKU, please connect with your manager
The location_id input is not matched the shop's location_id(more/wrong). Please double check.
Lack of location_id, please double check.
Please wait for the holiday mode set then to edit item. Please try later.
Total stock must be more than reserved stock.
Wholesale cannot be used in this category and attributes.
Your shop can not use model level dts
You do not have right to use seller location_id, please only fill seller_stock filed.
Can not update item with stock less than reserved stock

Can not update item with different stock structure. Can only update seller stock with location id when existing seller stock have location id. Can only update seller stock without location id when existing seller stock without location id.
Can not update item with stock less than reserve stock
The merchant/shop has multi warehouse, please input location id
Stock should be larger than reserved stock.
Interal error, please contact openapi team
Our system is taking some time to respond, please try later.
Image is invalid: single image url length is less than 32.
Item published item count reaches limit.
Count of hash tags is more than 18
Item name could not be empty.
Item_name length is less than min limit.
The length of item_name is bigger than max limit.
Description length is less than the min limit.
Original_price is less than min price limit.
Original_price is bigger than max price limit.
Wholesale price is less than ratio limit.

Can not update item with different stock structure. Can only update seller stock with location id when existing seller stock have location id. Can only update seller stock without location id when existing seller stock without location id.
Interal error, please contact openapi team.
Interal error, please contact openapi team.
Interal error, please contact openapi team.
Category IDs for L1 and L2 do not match.
The current day_to_ship is bigger than category's max days_to_ship.
Category is blocked for CB seller.
Interal error, please contact openapi team.
Wholesale price can't more than original price.
